QuestData.Title: Their Hunt Continues
QuestData.Description: The black dragonflight means business. As you've probably already noticed, they've taken over a large portion of New Kargath. These troops are under the command of General Jirakka and his champion, Moldarr. They must be stopped.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Moldarr and Jirakka lead the core of the black flight's forces.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat General Jirakka, Moldarr, and 6 Blackflight dragonspawn.
QuestData.RewardText: Two more dangerous black dragons have been removed from this egg hunt. Your greatest task, however, still awaits.
